summary: I OWN A 2012 FORD FOCUS I BROUGHT IT BRAND NEW AND DROVE IT OFF THE LOT. THIS CAR HAS BEEN IN THE DEALERSHIP 3 TIMES FOR THE TRANSMISSION BUT IT IS STILL WORSE THAN DRIVING A MANUAL!!! I WAS NOTIFIED MONTHS AND MONTHS AGO THAT THERE IS A RECALL FOR THE DOOR LATCHES. I HAVE CALLED SEVERAL TIMES TRYING TO FIND OUT THE LATEST INFO ON THE RECALL. NOT TO MY SURPRISE NO ONE FROM FORD HAS BOTHERED TO CALL ME BACK!!! I HAVE MY FAMILY IN THIS CAR AND I DO NOT WANT ANY OF THEM POPPING OUT!!! SHAME ON FORD FOR SELLING THESE CARS.
